headline: Is Coinbase Global (COIN) Pricing Fair After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: Wondering whether Coinbase Global's share price still reflects its true value, or if the market has moved ahead of the fundamentals you care about? The stock last closed at US$175.95, after a 2.7% move over the past week, a 16.0% decline over the last 30 days, a 25.6% decline year to date, and an 18.4% decline over the past year, while the 3 year return sits at a gain of about 2.7x. Recent headlines have continued to focus on Coinbase Global's role as a major listed crypto exchange, often...

headline: MrBeast Editor Suspended After Insider Trading Fine
summary: Beast Industries suspended MrBeast editor Artem Kaptur after Kalshi fined and banned him for alleged insider trading, as scrutiny grows on prediction markets.

headline: Coinbase Global, Inc. (COIN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Coinbase Global, Inc. on The Reservist’s Substack by Yehoshua Zlotogorski. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on COIN. Coinbase Global, Inc.’s share was trading at $164.32 as of February 13th. COIN’s trailing and forward P/E were 36.93 and 26.60 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Coinbase Global, Inc. operates […]

headline: Needham Cuts Coinbase (COIN) Price Target as Bitcoin Trading Volatility Looms
summary: Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) ranks among the best stocks to buy now for long-term growth. On February 13, Needham reduced its price target for Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) from $290 to $230 while retaining a Buy rating on the company’s shares. The drop follows Coinbase’s most recent quarterly results, which were in line with the […]
